verses.verse: And there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>wonder<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> her <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and on her <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G792>stars:<s%>
And she <S%G2192>being<s%> with <S%G1722>child<s%> <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G5605>travailing<s%> in <S%G5605>birth,<s%> and <S%G928>pained<s%> to be <S%G5088>delivered.<s%>

And there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>wonder<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven;<s%> and <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4450>red<s%> <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns,<s%> and <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1238>crowns<s%> on his <S%G2776>heads.<s%>

And his <S%G3769>tail<s%> <S%G4951>drew<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> part of the <S%G792>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and did <S%G906>cast<s%> them to the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> and the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G3195>ready<s%> to be <S%G5088>delivered,<s%> for to <S%G2719>devour<s%> her <S%G5043>child<s%> as <S%G3752>soon<s%> as it was <S%G5088>born.<s%>

And she <S%G5088>brought<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G730>man<s%> <S%G5207>child,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was to <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron:<s%> and her <S%G5043>child<s%> was <S%G726>caught<s%> up to <S%G2316>God,<s%> and to his <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

And the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> she <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that they should <S%G5142>feed<s%> her <S%G1563>there<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> and three <S%G1835>score<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And there was <S%G4171>war<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> and his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4170>fought<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon;<s%> and the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G4170>fought<s%> and his <S%G32>angels,<s%>

And the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> out, that <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent,<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G1228>Devil,<s%> and <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4105>deceives<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world:<s%> he was <S%G906>cast<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and his <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G906>cast<s%> out with him.

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G737>Now<s%> is <S%G1096>come<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> and <S%G1411>strength,<s%> and the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of our <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G1849>power<s%> of his <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> for the <S%G2725>accuser<s%> of our <S%G80>brothers<s%> is <S%G2598>cast<s%> <S%G2598>down,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> them <S%G1799>before<s%> our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night.<s%>

And they <S%G3528>overcame<s%> him by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> and by the <S%G3056>word<s%> of their <S%G3141>testimony;<s%> and they <S%G25>loved<s%> not their <S%G5590>lives<s%> to the <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2165>rejoice,<s%> you <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> and you that <S%G4637>dwell<s%> in them. <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to the <S%G2730>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and of the <S%G2281>sea!<s%> for the <S%G1228>devil<s%> is <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to you, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> because he <S%G1492>knows<s%> that he <S%G2192>has<s%> but a <S%G3641>short<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G906>cast<s%> to the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> he <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G5088>brought<s%> <S%G5088>forth<s%> the <S%G730>man<s%> child.

And to the <S%G1135>woman<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G105>eagle,<s%> that she might <S%G4072>fly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> her <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> she is <S%G5142>nourished<s%> for a <S%G2540>time,<s%> and <S%G2540>times,<s%> and <S%G2255>half<s%> a <S%G2540>time,<s%> from the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3789>serpent.<s%>

And the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> as a <S%G4215>flood<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> that he might <S%G4160>cause<s%> her to be <S%G4216>carried<s%> away of the <S%G4216>flood.<s%>

And the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G997>helped<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> her <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and <S%G2666>swallowed<s%> up the <S%G4215>flood<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

And the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was <S%G3710>wroth<s%> with the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> with the <S%G3062>remnant<s%> of her <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
